campaign_description:
Join the Scalar DAO Community


Scalar DAO is inviting you to join its community to be early BELIEVERS in the project. Being a DAO, Scalar will democratize Margin Trading on DEXs with your support, contribution and governance.


Make sure you fulfill the Tasks here to be rewarded with the "BELIEVERS" NFT - that will hold substantial benefits for their owners.


About Believers NFT


The Scalar DAO "Believers NFT" is a limited-edition digital collectible minted by Scalar DAO that will be handed out to select early believers and active supporters of our decentralized autonomous organization. By completing various engagement tasks such as social media interactions, following Scalar DAO on multiple channels, and referring friends, participants become eligible for this exclusive NFT. 


Believers NFT holders gain access to a range of exciting benefits, including Whitelisting for exclusive priority access to product releases, airdrop of native protocol token, VIP event access and more.


Visit here for more details: https://medium.com/@scalardao/scalar-dao-native-token-airdrop-to-believers-475af4ca12de


About Scalar DAO


Scalar DAO is a Universal, Open-Source, Cross-Chain Leverage Protocol democratizing Margin trading on DEXs. It leverages blockchain for transparency, security, and efficiency. Operating across multiple blockchains, Scalar DAO connects users to diverse assets and markets. It is open-source and has decentralized decision-making, thus promoting innovation & shaping the protocol‚Äôs future. Scalar DAO aims to pioneer DeFi adoption and revolutionize the leveraged financial markets in DeFi.


Website | Twitter | Telegram | Announcements | Blogs | LinkedIn
title: Join the Scalar DAO Community

campaign_description: Sacred Sorcery: Awaken the Juju Spirits" is an homage to the resilience and spirituality of Africa, a celebration of the wisdom and magic that lies within its diverse cultures. It is an invitation to honor and appreciate the practices that have shaped generations and fostered a deep connection between humanity and the spiritual realm. By embracing this collection, you become a custodian of ancient knowledge and a conduit for the potent energies of Juju. As an NFT collector, you embark on a personal journey of spiritual awakening and cultural appreciation. Your ownership of these sacred artifacts grants you a connection to the traditions that have shaped communities and brought people closer to their roots for centuries.
title: NFT OG_Rewards

campaign_description:
This collection transcends the physical realm, delving into the realm of symbolism and mythology. The Inferno Serpent embodies the profound significance attributed to serpents across cultures, representing transformation, rebirth, and healing. Within its fiery embrace lies the potential for personal growth and metamorphosis.

Each artwork in the Inferno Serpent collection is meticulously composed, embracing dynamic elements that accentuate the python's fiery presence. Witness the serpentine creature coiled, poised for action, or caught mid-movement, radiating a sense of energy and vitality. Through expert use of negative space and perspective, the artistry amplifies the impact, ensnaring your imagination.
title: NFT Reward for Holders

campaign_description:
In this course, you will first learn about the concept of "Fractional NFT" and how this kind of digital asset works. Then, you will learn more about the fractional NFT proposed by Fracton Protocol, which is called hiNFT, through its core mechanism, trading process, trading benefits, etc. Finally, you will learn how to trade hiNFT on KuCoin, a CEX where hiNFT is trending.


Through this course, you will be able to better capitalize on the investment opportunities in the NFT market and gain a deeper understanding of possible trends in the future development of this space.


Complete the course now, get a badge, and gain a chance to share a 1,000U prize (100 winners, 10U each).

campaign_description:
TransFi is offering 10 USDT as a reward, everyday for 5 LUCKY WINNERS on buying any crypto worth 25 USD



Make a Transaction on TransFi and get rewarded with 10 USDT daily for 5 lucky winners

500 USDT for 1 lucky winner who transacts more than 250 USD





HOW TO GET STARTED:

  • Go to buy.transfi.com
  • Enter an amount & select tokens
  • Sign up via email & verify OTP
  • Enter the wallet address
  • Confirm your order
  • Select a payment method
  • Complete the payment transaction
  • Crypto will be delivered to the wallet address
  • Winners will be contacted via email separately to claim rewards.







About TransFi

TransFi offers seamless and easy crypto onramp and offramp in local payment methods at the lowest costs supporting all major cryptos across all major Asian markets. With over 50+ popular payment methods & native language support and 24/7 customer support, users can have a hassle-free experience and get the crypto delivered to their self-custodial wallets in a matter of seconds with 90%+ conversion rate
title: BUY CRYPTO - WIN 500 USDT for 1 LUCKY WINNER & 10 USDT REWARDS EVERYDAY

campaign_description:
Claim instructions


1„ÄÅAfter you get whitelisted, you can mint a silver badge for free on the veDAO website. You just need to pay a little gas fee (expected to be less than 0.005BNB). https://www.vedao.com/nft


Benefits of the veDAO Community Silver Badge NFT


1„ÄÅHolders can claim 500,000 AlphaDAO.

2„ÄÅHolders enjoy Talent Scout benefits and can apply for Talent Scout status to receive an additional 150,000 AlphaDAO.

3„ÄÅHolders have the opportunity to receive tokens sponsored by other programs.


About AlphaDAO and DAO


The official token is DAO, with an issuance price of $0.01. After AlphaDAO is listed, you can redeem DAO. The redemption amount depends on your activities and contributions to the platform, ranging from a maximum of 500,000 DAO ($5,000) to a minimum of 50,000 DAO ($500).

Note: If you do not meet the requirements for activities and contributions, you will not be able to complete the redemption process.
title: 20 veDAO NFT WL Airdrop

ü™ô With 0xtool NFT, you can:


  • Access On-chain Guru - AI chatbox that can answer all your questions on Blockchain: Let's ask something like "What wallet made the most profit on PEPE?", "What is his trading strategy".
  • Experience the power of Smart Money access, your key to dominating the market with intelligent strategies derived from top wallet movements. Stay informed about which coins/tokens are being held or purchased by influential investors, and gain valuable insights from their trading practices.
  • Gain access to our Trading Strategy feature, which enables you to track and emulate the trading strategies of our bots. Explore the LONG/SHORT positions guidance and review the comprehensive trading history. This invaluable tool will greatly assist you in maximizing your investment returns.


JOIN US NOW TO PUMP YOUR BAG! üöÄ

campaign_description:
Mission specific process


1„ÄÅBy binding your personal Twitter account on the veDAO official website, your wallet address automatically gets whitelisted. ‚Äãhttps://app.vedao.com/profile

2„ÄÅEach eligible address can claim 500,000 AlphaDAO (worth $5,000) by paying a small transaction fee (estimated to be 0.005 BNB). Once you claim AlphaDAO, the system will automatically stake it for you in the background. During the staking period, you will have governance rights on veDAO, allowing you to participate in voting, submit projects, and write project reviews.

3„ÄÅYou can click on any of the projects to vote. ‚Äãhttps://app.vedao.com/projects

4„ÄÅPlease submit a screenshot of your successful vote.ÔºàIn the picture we can see the address of your walletÔºâ


Claim instructions


1„ÄÅAfter you get whitelisted, you can mint a silver badge for free on the veDAO website. You just need to pay a little gas fee (expected to be less than 0.005BNB). https://www.vedao.com/nft


Benefits of the veDAO Community Silver Badge NFT


1„ÄÅHolders can claim 500,000 AlphaDAO.

2„ÄÅHolders enjoy Talent Scout benefits and can apply for Talent Scout status to receive an additional 150,000 AlphaDAO.

3„ÄÅHolders have the opportunity to receive tokens sponsored by other programs.


About AlphaDAO and DAO


The official token is DAO, with an issuance price of $0.01. After AlphaDAO is listed, you can redeem DAO. The redemption amount depends on your activities and contributions to the platform, ranging from a maximum of 500,000 DAO ($5,000) to a minimum of 50,000 DAO ($500).

Note: If you do not meet the requirements for activities and contributions, you will not be able to complete the redemption process.

Sui is a Layer 1 blockchain and smart contract platform designed to make digital asset ownership fast, private, secure, and accessible to everyone.
